meta.job_title: Head of Product Management and Marketing for Fixed Wireless Access

duties_responsibilities.duty: Create the overarching business strategy and plan to effectively and profitably develop and deploy emerging and scalable FWA products and solutions.
Ownership of the go-to-market plan for driving adoption and revenue generation.
Drive acquisition of customers by actively developing and managing channel partners and sales and marketing teams.
Work with Product Development to ensure desired products and services to address the Market Opportunity.
Work closely with executive management and board of directors to align Mobility strategy and business plan with the overall organizational goals, objectives, and revenue plan.

Define, develop, ensure customer experience that is truly differentiated and enhanced, intuitive and fully integrated, automated with self-care to drive customer satisfaction, retention and increased usage.
Ensure end-to-end Mobility business meets financial and customer performance KPIs.
Lead supporting organization and all product/solutions teams, including both general administrative and more detailed strategic leadership.
Maintain end-to-end ownership of the products and solutions.
Define KPIs for Business Success of Products.
Enable continuous ongoing reporting of Product KPIs.
Ensure proper ongoing health monitoring of deployed products and services – scalability, availability and performance.
Work with customer care to enable support for production launched products/services.
Provide product performance/usage results to Product.
Provide inputs into product development for product feature roadmap and enhancements.
Develop and communicate team goals as well as track team accomplishments.
Recruit (and retain) excellent team members, establish roles and responsibilities.
Clearly define tasks to keep accountability towards achievement of team goals.
Motivate and mentor team members to establish and accomplish business and personal professional goals.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in Business, Engineering, Computer Science preferred(Bachelor’s degree acceptable with right level of work experience)
